5.2.2 CLASS-INSTANCE PAIRS

5.2.2.5 COMPOUND ICONIC OBJECTS

A screen is not the display, it a capture of a certain state of information within the sign system. The view can in turn be used an object within another iconic object ordered pair as indicated below. I* is an icon class while O* is the view V.

(EQ 6) I = <I*, V*> = <I*, O*>

Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
